overview: Bo-hee a middle school student is a fragile and sensitive boy. His best friend Sungreen is an unbreakable girl. After being told by his mother that his father died long ago, Bo-hee accidentally finds out that he might still be alive. Feeling betrayed by his own mother, Bohee runs away from home and visits his half-sister Namhee with his friend Sungreen to collect clues about his father. He meets his cousin, her boyfriend and his father’s friends. In the process, he comes to realize what he really yearns for and what is meaningful in his life. This is a coming of age story of a boy, and of all of us.
tagline: We're bosom buddies. We're making a documentary.
title: A Boy and Sungreen
